snippet.title: Let's Build a Dungeon - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Get a deep dive into the gameplay of Let's Build a Dungeon and learn what you can expect from this upcoming management sim from the creators of Let's Build a Zoo. In Let's Build a Dungeon, manage a game studio making the world’s greatest MMORPG. Hire designers, coders, and testers, create a fantasy world, then welcome hundreds of virtual players. If they get bored they will cancel their subscription and your investors will have your head. You can even play the game you create. Let's Build a Dungeon will be available on Xbox and Steam.
